mapper.select: select advertid, advertcontent, imgurl, httpurl, DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createtime, createid from c_t_app_advert

select count(0) from (select 1 as type ,max(A.coverimg) coverimg,A.title,max(A.httpurl) as httpurl,max(A.description) as description from (select mo.movieid, mo.coverimg, mo.title, mo.httpurl, mo.description, ao.orderid from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membermovie mo on ao.cardid = mo.cardid and mo.status = 1
and ao.buyuserid=#{userid} and ao.status = 3 and mo.movieid is not null
order by mo.hotforder desc ) A group by A.title ) C

select max(A.coverimg) coverimg,A.title,max(A.httpurl) as httpurl,max(A.description) as description from ( select coverimg, title, httpurl, description from c_t_app_movie am
and (locate(#{videodesc},am.title) > 0 or locate(#{videodesc},am.description) > 0) and status = 1
union select mo.coverimg, mo.title, mo.httpurl, mo.description from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membermovie mo on ao.cardid = mo.cardid and mo.status = 1
and (locate(#{videodesc},mo.title) > 0 or locate(#{videodesc},mo.description) > 0) and ao.buyuserid=#{userid} and ao.status = 3 and mo.movieid is not null
) A group by A.title
